text: geudaeneun boji moshayeossneunyo ha nanimkkeseo haneullobuteo bileul naeligehasigo geugeos-eulo ttangsog-e umul-eul dusyeoss-eumyeo geuleon hu gajigagsaeg-ui seo lo daleun chomog-eul saengseongke hasigo geuleon hu geugeos-i sideul-eo nolahge doem-egeubunkkeseo geugeos-eul sansanjogag-eulo hasim-eul geudaeneun bolini sillo geu an-eneun ihaehaneun salamdeul-eul wihan gyohun ui gyesiga issnola
